author: kelvingoodson
msg: Updating the trunk to EMF 2.2.3 -- this doesn't fix the DAS release problem because they are based on the SDO beta1,  and so still require EMF 2.2.2 to be published somewhere,  but at last it stops the trunk from failing.  This update solves part of the issue in TUSCANY-1369
